messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Alright kiddosss, turn dem sssuit sssensssorsss up ssso i know to run my asss over there and defib yoursss. SSSeriousssly it makesss my job a million timesss easssier, ssso in consssideration of my sssanity, do it pleassse.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
